title: Topic 001 Question 037
body: You are the delegated provider for an Azure Stack Hub integrated system.
You have an offer named Offer1.
You need to add the Azure Key Vault service to Offer1. The solution must minimize administrative effort.
options: From the portal of the Azure Stack Hub tenant, register the Key Vault service.
Send a request to the Azure Stack Hub operator to add the Key Vault service to Offer1.
From the Azure Stack Hub PowerShell, run the Set-AzsOfferDelegation cmdlet.
From the Azure Stack Hub administrator portal, add the Key Vault service to Offer1.
